thread.title: g rica

author: g rica
title: g rica
text: My go to styles are all here and there are many ways to glam it up or dress them down not to mention the variety of shoes which are very fashion forward. It definitely gives me that edge to stand out. I always get so many compliments. However, there are many dresses that fall in the category of the thinner, more fragile side and I prefer the thicker fabrics as oppose to the thinner ones when it comes to deciding what to buy for dresses. I am around mostly children and they want to touch and/or feel everything so it is imperative that my clothes are durable and versatile yet still look amazing. Thank you.
